attributes.action: make representations to the government of Belgium over the British IT in Belgium issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is undemocratic and unfair that the British IT resources available in Belgium are not available to those of us in the Canary islands. We the undersigned request that the British IT resource available in Belgium is no longer denied to the the Canary islands.

rejection.details: It is not clear exactly what you are requesting. Please provide more detail on what you mean by the "British IT in Belgium issue"
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
